name: The Unfair Fruit
description:
This game was banned from the Apple App Store for violating the following:

Guideline 2.3.10 - Performance - Accurate Metadata

"Your app includes the following references to Apple's processes or policies, which are not relevant to the app's content and functionality."

I've modified the game slightly with touch controls instead of motion for the web, but the content is the same. I have been effectively banned from the App Store unless I update this game with more content and remove all mentions of Apple's Guidelines because that is against their guidelines. All of my games have been removed from the App Store and are no longer available for download even if you "own" it.
